detailed_profile.position: President & Chief Human Resources Officer @ IIFL Finance
detailed_profile.about: A strategic HR leader with over two decades of experience, I bring a business-first lens to people development, talent strategy, and organisational effectiveness. My expertise lies in architecting enterprise-wide learning ecosystems, driving capability transformation, and shaping cultures that enable performance and agility. I‚Äôve worked across the HR value chain, partnering with business leaders to align talent priorities with organisational vision, embed leadership behaviours, and future-proof the workforce. Passionate about building high-impact people practices, I focus on unlocking potential at scale through structured programs, data-led decisions, and a deep understanding of evolving workplace dynamics. As organisations grow and transform, I believe HR must lead from the front with empathy, foresight, and a sharp view of business outcomes.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Preparation of corporate, regional & sector wise budgets, analysis of variances and initiating steps to resolve the variance by communicating these to respective business headsPioneered the introduction of Profit Centres and Cost Centres to enable better financial control and ensure smooth Income and Balance-Sheet managementInitiated and implemented departmental budgeting exercise in the organizationResponsible for preparation and monitoring of ALM statement and maintaining strict control on ALM (Liquidity) gaps in the Dynamic Buckets.Ensuring timely preparation & filing of all RBI returns and other compliances, correspondences. Have handled RBI inspection for last 6 years without any adverse comment from the Apex Institution.Ensuring timely preparation & circulation of monthly branch profitability statements of over 1100 branches & other allied MIS, and recording the reasons for deviations and reporting the same to the top managementEvaluation of new business proposals and providing reports to top management to help in decision making.Providing critical periodic information to credit rating agencies / banksStreamlining of DSS / MIS processes & minimising duplication Ratio analysis & inter firm comparisons on a quarterly basis to keep track of competition and analyse company‚Äôs position vis-√†-vis competition Evaluating and implementing standard requirements which can be system driven to ensure quicker delivery.Preparation of adhoc reports & analysis as & when required by the managementProfessional Achievements:One of the top 15 people in the company to be a part of the prestigious EPDP program of the companyInitiated departmental budgeting exercise in the organizationLed the decentralization of accounts of the company
experience.description_html:
Preparation of corporate, regional & sector wise budgets, analysis of variances and initiating steps to resolve the variance by communicating these to respective business heads
Pioneered the introduction of Profit Centres and Cost Centres to enable better financial control and ensure smooth Income and Balance-Sheet management
Initiated and implemented departmental budgeting exercise in the organization
Responsible for preparation and monitoring of ALM statement and maintaining strict control on ALM (Liquidity) gaps in the Dynamic Buckets.
Ensuring timely preparation & filing of all RBI returns and other compliances, correspondences. Have handled RBI inspection for last 6 years without any adverse comment from the Apex Institution.
Ensuring timely preparation & circulation of monthly branch profitability statements of over 1100 branches & other allied MIS, and recording the reasons for deviations and reporting the same to the top management
Evaluation of new business proposals and providing reports to top management to help in decision making.
Providing critical periodic information to credit rating agencies / banks
Streamlining of DSS / MIS processes & minimising duplication
Ratio analysis & inter firm comparisons on a quarterly basis to keep track of competition and analyse company’s position vis-à-vis competition
Evaluating and implementing standard requirements which can be system driven to ensure quicker delivery.
Preparation of adhoc reports & analysis as & when required by the management

Professional Achievements:
One of the top 15 people in the company to be a part of the prestigious EPDP program of the company
Initiated departmental budgeting exercise in the organization
Led the decentralization of accounts of the company

positions.title: Lead - Learning Technologies & Engagement
positions.description_html:
Leading strategic digital learning initiatives to enhance employee capability, engagement, and experience across IIFL Finance through a blend of technology and innovation.

Key Responsibilities & Achievements:

Designing and implemented blended learning journeys for functional upskilling in collaboration with business stakeholders.

Driving MS adoption through structured campaigns, completion tracking, post-training assessments, and feedback surveys.

Integrated LMS with HRMS and digital tools (API, Power BI, AI Chatbot, WABA, RPA) to enhance automation and user experience.

Developed SOPs, communication workflows, and engagement frameworks to drive a culture of learning across functions.

Executing behavioural training programs, role based journeys and functional certifications.

Initiated Process Improvement and Automation projects to drive impactful outcomes.

Spearheading vendor evaluation and management for content libraries and leadership capability programs.

Managing dashboard, annual budget and cost optimization of programs

Compliance reporting aligned with internal and external governance requirements.

detailed_profile.name: Saikat Banerjee
detailed_profile.position: National Sales Head - Unsecured Business Loans and LAP @ IIFL Finance
detailed_profile.about: A professional with 18 years of strategic, product, and sales experience in banking and NBFCs and a specialist in Microfinance, Business loans, and SME/MSME loans. Successfully lead team sizes ranging from 20 to 290 personnel for the last 15 years with strong leadership, Team management, and conflict management capabilities in various organisations and functions. Handled multiple functions like sales, marketing, customer service, strategic initiatives and product development of MSE loans, Agri loan, Auto Loan, Gold Loan, Personal & Business loan, Microfinance and Call Centre. Possess a keen sense of business and opportunity forged with strong Business Relationship and negotiating skills. Conceptualised, created, developed, and launched Agri loan vertical in Reliance Commercial Finance. Also launched, ramped up operations and execution of Emerging Micro vertical ( MSME loans) for Jana Small Finance Bank. As an expert in business strategies also adept at making business plans and set up verticals from scratch.

detailed_profile.position: Senior Growth Marketing Manager at IIFL Finance | Growth Strategist & ASO Specialist | Exploring All Things Digital & Martech
detailed_profile.about: Hi, I am Ashmi Shah working as a Senior Growth Marketing Manager at IIFL. You can consider me as someone who is learning everything marketing around gold be it in the form of watches, jewelry or loan. (Yes, Golden girl :P). I have recently also discovered the beautiful integration of Tech and Marketing and how it helps a business to generate revenue. After exploring my knack for marketing at a luxury watch retail company in Mumbai I decided to pursue Post Graduation in Digital Marketing from IIDE. I love cooking and Cafe hopping. I have graduated from Narsee Monjee College of Commerce and Economics, Mumbai. That's me. Let's Connect!

detailed_profile.name: Sheetal Agarwal
detailed_profile.position: Published Author | Part of the core team of writers/researchers in the UN SDG Corporate Guidebook (SDGs 4,5) | Business Communication | ESG Communication | Poet
detailed_profile.about: I am a business writer with over 16 years of experience ‚Äì large part of which has been across business journalism. I started out as an analyst with CRISIL research and have tracked several sectors (IT, BFSI, Auto, Telecom, etc.) since then. I have covered a vast array of topics, interviewed eminent industry experts and delivered several front page/prime time stories throughout my journalism career. Quick turnaround of high quality, well researched articles (in both long and short format) is what I have been known for throughout my career. Over the years, I have ventured beyond stock analysis and transformed myself into a complete content professional ‚Äì be it strategizing, writing, editing or advising. I have also been on the client servicing side and have provided strategic guidance, training and content writing expertise to top managements of some of India‚Äôs leading companies ‚Äì helping them enhance their ESG communication. Writing has become my preferred form of expression, even though I am equally confident in front of the camera. While my forte lies in business writing, I occasionally use my social media platforms to pen my thoughts on other topics close to my heart. I am a perpetual learner and believe my journey of becoming the best version of myself has just started. I embraced motherhood in 2021 and my amazing baby girl inspired me to venture into a territory hitherto unknown to me - writing poems. And I became a published author with my first anthology - Colourful Pebbles.

experience.title: AVP - Content and ESG
experience.description: At IIFL, I take care of content and communication across all Group companies and I work closely with the top management. Be it corporate blogs, project reports, policies (ESG, CSR, etc.) or capital-market related features, I write them with equal ease. From reviewing and enhancing content on group websites to strengthening the narrative of annual reports and editing research reports; I cover the entire spectrum of content at the Group. I am also playing an important role in driving integration of ESG initiatives at the Group by coordinating with all stakeholders (including ESG analysts), writing sustainability reports and developing insightful videos, interviews and articles on all things ESG. I also  head the team of editorial content writers at IndiaInfoline.com.

experience.title: Zonal HR Manager
experience.description: -Managing UP/UK/Bihar&Jharkhand across with a team of two. Handling almost 200 plus branches and 1000 plus manpower.-As a Zonal HR manager my responsibility lies majorly in Manpower planning, engagement with the stakeholders and implement relevant strategies to fulfill manpower gaps for existing and upcoming branches. - Ensuring full knowledge of competition so as to get the competitive edge over market. Planning for future manpower through aggressive interview drives, calling and marketing about the current position through various sourcing channels. -Engage with employees of the region quarterly on various platform through branch visit, training session and impart knowledge related to new processes and policy. (Leadership training/ Refresher training)- Control over attrition through a regular connect with the exit staff and try to understand the attrition reason. Retain employees through a competitive edge.- Connecting with team members and guide them through the Talent acquisition processes  and work upon to close the gaps within TAT. Ensuring that compliance and process is followed.- Career progression planning through monthly role elevation drives and promoting internal pool.- Sharing of ideas with management related to HR processes to make processes smooth and give a competitive edge over other players.
experience.description_html:
-Managing UP/UK/Bihar&Jharkhand across with a team of two. Handling almost 200 plus branches and 1000 plus manpower.

-As a Zonal HR manager my responsibility lies majorly in Manpower planning, engagement with the stakeholders and implement relevant strategies to fulfill manpower gaps for existing and upcoming branches.

- Ensuring full knowledge of competition so as to get the competitive edge over market. Planning for future manpower through aggressive interview drives, calling and marketing about the current position through various sourcing channels.

-Engage with employees of the region quarterly on various platform through branch visit, training session and impart knowledge related to new processes and policy. (Leadership training/ Refresher training)

- Control over attrition through a regular connect with the exit staff and try to understand the attrition reason. Retain employees through a competitive edge.

- Connecting with team members and guide them through the Talent acquisition processes and work upon to close the gaps within TAT. Ensuring that compliance and process is followed.

- Career progression planning through monthly role elevation drives and promoting internal pool.

- Sharing of ideas with management related to HR processes to make processes smooth and give a competitive edge over other players.

experience.title: HR Assistant
experience.description: Talent Acquisition:‚Ä¢	Managing recruitment cycle of the unit.‚Ä¢	Collaborate with hiring managers on short- term and long term hiring plans.‚Ä¢	Experience of handling mid level and senior level positions.‚Ä¢	Internal sourcing and profiling.‚Ä¢	Manpower panning & gap analysis.Orientation & On Boarding:‚Ä¢	Managed on boarding recess for all the new joiners.‚Ä¢	 Conducting / Coordinating Induction program for the new joinees.‚Ä¢	Developed process and communicating all company related policies and procedures to the new employees.‚Ä¢	Ensuring document verification, asset allocation, query resolution &On boarding session.Employee Engagement:‚Ä¢	Taking initiatives on the celebrations and Fun activities.‚Ä¢	Carrying out motivational engaging communication to the employees via mails.‚Ä¢	Suggesting and implementing creative engagement activities for employees. Family day out, staff picnics / events get together, monthly birthdays etc.‚Ä¢	Organizing company's annual event 'Rendezvous' across the zone.Payroll Processing:‚Ä¢	Driving payroll for 1000employeesregion level which includes leaves exits etc.‚Ä¢	Consolidation of Payroll with all inputs like Collection on attendance, leaves, employee information changes, Loans, Advances, Adhoc Payments, and Reimbursements of North Zone, as per Pay Roll Advice Format.‚Ä¢	Handling Payroll Grievances' if any.‚Ä¢	Generating Statutory reports - PF, ESI, PTetcStatutory Compliances:‚Ä¢	Timely providing of ESI & FHPL forms to new employees.‚Ä¢	Handling Statutory Compliance, Filing of monthly P.Tax within the due dates.‚Ä¢	Processing PF claims of left employees.Other HR Activities:‚Ä¢	Issuing Show cause notices, Warning letters, Absconding Letters, Termination letters for the concern staff and asking for their explanation.‚Ä¢	Analysis of the Training Feedback form, Monitor the Training evaluation & Training History.‚Ä¢	Handling Attendance.‚Ä¢	Hands on Experience in People Soft.
experience.description_html:
Talent Acquisition:

• Managing recruitment cycle of the unit.
• Collaborate with hiring managers on short- term and long term hiring plans.
• Experience of handling mid level and senior level positions.
• Internal sourcing and profiling.
• Manpower panning & gap analysis.

Orientation & On Boarding:

• Managed on boarding recess for all the new joiners.
• Conducting / Coordinating Induction program for the new joinees.
• Developed process and communicating all company related policies and procedures to the new employees.
• Ensuring document verification, asset allocation, query resolution &On boarding session.

Employee Engagement:

• Taking initiatives on the celebrations and Fun activities.
• Carrying out motivational engaging communication to the employees via mails.
• Suggesting and implementing creative engagement activities for employees. Family day out, staff picnics / events get together, monthly birthdays etc.
• Organizing company's annual event 'Rendezvous' across the zone.

Payroll Processing:

• Driving payroll for 1000employeesregion level which includes leaves exits etc.
• Consolidation of Payroll with all inputs like Collection on attendance, leaves, employee information changes, Loans, Advances, Adhoc Payments, and Reimbursements of North Zone, as per Pay Roll Advice Format.
• Handling Payroll Grievances' if any.
• Generating Statutory reports - PF, ESI, PTetc

Statutory Compliances:

• Timely providing of ESI & FHPL forms to new employees.
• Handling Statutory Compliance, Filing of monthly P.Tax within the due dates.
• Processing PF claims of left employees.

Other HR Activities:

• Issuing Show cause notices, Warning letters, Absconding Letters, Termination letters for the concern staff and asking for their explanation.
• Analysis of the Training Feedback form, Monitor the Training evaluation & Training History.
• Handling Attendance.
• Hands on Experience in People Soft.

detailed_profile.name: ANAM SHAIKH
detailed_profile.position: Internal Auditor @ IIFL Finance | Certified Fraud Examiner (CFE)
detailed_profile.about: As the Internal Auditor for IIFL Finance, my role revolves around fortifying financial integrity and mitigating risks. With a Master's in Business Administration emphasizing finance, I wield a sharp acumen in detecting, investigating, and preventing fraud, a testament to my Certified Fraud Examiner (CFE) status. Previously, my tenure at Kotak Mahindra Bank and Axis Bank honed my proficiency in banking operations, fostering a robust compliance landscape. My commitment lies in safeguarding assets and championing transparent financial practices, aligning with my educational foundation in entrepreneurship and finance.

positions.description_html:
I established the gold loan vertical for India Infoline Finance Ltd., in Gujarat. Handle 69 branches across Ahmedabad, Saurashtra & Kutch.

I led the setting up of new branches from selection of area, setting up of offices, hiring and training of the staff. Also, led all the 69 branches to achieve profitability within first year itself.

detailed_profile.name: Shashank Jain
detailed_profile.position: Designer@IIFL Finance & IIFL Securities | Product Design | Ex- Designer@HDFC Bank | HFI CUA‚Ñ¢ | IIT Hyderabad
detailed_profile.about: Experienced UX Designer with a passion for turning complex problems into elegant and user-centric solutions. Currently, I'm contributing my design expertise as a UX Designer at IIFL Finance & IIFL Securities, with a track record of defining problem statements, conducting user research, and designing intuitive user interfaces. I've also served as a UX Specialist at HDFC Bank, where I honed my skills in task analysis, wireframing, and visual design. My approach to UX design is grounded in psychology and human behavior, and I leverage tools like Figma, XD, and prototyping to bring my ideas to life. With a certification from HFI CUA Human Factors International, I bring a deep understanding of user-centered design principles to every project. My journey in UX design is driven by a commitment to learning and innovation. I thrive on collaborating with cross-functional teams to discuss design strategies and turn them into reality. Whether it's ideation, usability testing, or crafting engaging user experiences, I'm dedicated to delivering results that matter. Let's connect and explore how my expertise in UX design can contribute to your team's success. Feel free to reach out‚ÄîI'm always up for a chat about UX, design, or the latest industry trends.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: I‚Äôm passionate about bringing the authentic flavors of India to your kitchen. We specialize in offering premium, 100% natural spices, sourced directly from trusted farmers and prepared using traditional methods to ensure every jar is packed with purity and taste.Our journey began with a desire to create high-quality, preservative-free spices that not only elevate your meals but also contribute to a healthy lifestyle. We‚Äôve made it our mission to maintain the integrity of Indian culinary traditions while delivering a product that meets modern standards of sustainability and transparency.I‚Äôm proud to share that our spices are now available on Amazon and Flipkart, making it easier for you to experience the richness of Indian cooking, no matter where you are. As we continue to grow, my focus remains on creating meaningful partnerships, expanding our product line, and helping more people discover the joy of cooking with authentic spices.Feel free to connect with me to discuss potential collaborations or learn more about how we can bring the flavors of India into your home.
experience.description_html:
I’m passionate about bringing the authentic flavors of India to your kitchen. We specialize in offering premium, 100% natural spices, sourced directly from trusted farmers and prepared using traditional methods to ensure every jar is packed with purity and taste.

Our journey began with a desire to create high-quality, preservative-free spices that not only elevate your meals but also contribute to a healthy lifestyle. We’ve made it our mission to maintain the integrity of Indian culinary traditions while delivering a product that meets modern standards of sustainability and transparency.

I’m proud to share that our spices are now available on Amazon and Flipkart, making it easier for you to experience the richness of Indian cooking, no matter where you are. As we continue to grow, my focus remains on creating meaningful partnerships, expanding our product line, and helping more people discover the joy of cooking with authentic spices.

Feel free to connect with me to discuss potential collaborations or learn more about how we can bring the flavors of India into your home.

basic_info.name: Jigar Patel - Head - Litigation, IIFL Finance
basic_info.search_snippet: Head - Litigation, IIFL Finance | Disputes | Structured Deals | Real Estate Finance | IBC, SARFAESI, Intl. Arbitration | Ex-Piramal ¬∑ I'm a strategic legal ...

detailed_profile.name: Jigar Patel
detailed_profile.position: Head - Litigation, IIFL Finance | Disputes | Structured Deals | Real Estate Finance | IBC, SARFAESI, Intl. Arbitration | Ex-Piramal
detailed_profile.about: I‚Äôm a strategic legal professional with 11+ years of experience across NBFCs, ARCs, and law firms ‚Äî leading high-value litigation, funding transactions, and complex restructuring mandates. At IIFL Finance, I currently head litigation and transactions for the Commercial Real Estate Group. I manage a ‚Çπ4,000 Cr (~USD 467M) litigation book and have led deals totaling ‚Çπ2,134.5 Cr (~USD 249M), including structured term lending, NCD investments, and SR-backed assignments. My litigation work includes securing an industry-first interim order from the Bombay High Court and achieving RERA-directed recovery of flats worth ‚Çπ500 Cr (~USD 58M). Prior to this, I was the sole legal lead at Areion Finserve, handling legal, compliance, litigation, and funding (~‚Çπ130 Cr / USD 15.2M), with full responsibility for structuring and due diligence. At Piramal Capital, I managed the DHFL-acquired stressed portfolio (‚Çπ12,000 Cr / USD 1.4B), leading debt resolution, white-collar matters, and recoveries through IBC-driven litigation and complex restructuring ‚Äî including the ‚Çπ800 Cr (~USD 93M) hospital sale to Max Healthcare. I also led CIRP-based recoveries at Pegasus ARC, including an M&A where a NASDAQ-listed company acquired a printing firm via reverse merger. My strengths lie in IBC, SARFAESI, real estate/project finance, white-collar crime, debt restructuring, and legal strategy that delivers measurable outcomes.

experience.title: Head-Litigation
experience.description: I lead litigation and transactions for IIFL‚Äôs Commercial Real Estate Group, with a cross-functional role spanning dispute resolution, strategic funding, regulatory compliance, and recovery.	‚Ä¢	Manage a litigation portfolio exceeding ‚Çπ4,000 Cr (~USD 467M), including complex RERA, SARFAESI, white-collar, and ARC-related disputes.	‚Ä¢	Led transactions totaling approx. ‚Çπ2,134.5 Cr (~USD 249M), including:‚ñ™ Term loan lending: ‚Çπ871.5 Cr (~USD 102M) to multiple entities, including a listed real estate group‚ñ™ NCD investments: ‚Çπ500 Cr (~USD 58.3M)‚ñ™ Debt assignments/SR investments: ‚Çπ595 Cr (~USD 69.4M) (full cash consideration and/or SR subscription)‚ñ™ Real estate funding via revised JDAs (including SRA projects under amnesty scheme): ‚Çπ133 Cr (~USD 15.5M)	‚Ä¢	Structured complex documentation including share pledges of listed companies, hypothecation, and escrow arrangements.	‚Ä¢	Secured an industry-first interim order from the Bombay High Court in a lender vs ARC dispute involving appointment of an Independent Observer.	‚Ä¢	Achieved litigation-led RERA recovery, with orders directing handover of 8 flats worth ‚Çπ500+ Cr (~USD 58M) to IIFL Group.	‚Ä¢	Lead and mentor a team of 5 lawyers; oversee litigation MIS, legal budgets, and law firm engagement.
experience.description_html:
I lead litigation and transactions for IIFL’s Commercial Real Estate Group, with a cross-functional role spanning dispute resolution, strategic funding, regulatory compliance, and recovery.
• Manage a litigation portfolio exceeding ₹4,000 Cr (~USD 467M), including complex RERA, SARFAESI, white-collar, and ARC-related disputes.
• Led transactions totaling approx. ₹2,134.5 Cr (~USD 249M), including:
▪ Term loan lending: ₹871.5 Cr (~USD 102M) to multiple entities, including a listed real estate group
▪ NCD investments: ₹500 Cr (~USD 58.3M)
▪ Debt assignments/SR investments: ₹595 Cr (~USD 69.4M) (full cash consideration and/or SR subscription)
▪ Real estate funding via revised JDAs (including SRA projects under amnesty scheme): ₹133 Cr (~USD 15.5M)
• Structured complex documentation including share pledges of listed companies, hypothecation, and escrow arrangements.
• Secured an industry-first interim order from the Bombay High Court in a lender vs ARC dispute involving appointment of an Independent Observer.
• Achieved litigation-led RERA recovery, with orders directing handover of 8 flats worth ₹500+ Cr (~USD 58M) to IIFL Group.
• Lead and mentor a team of 5 lawyers; oversee litigation MIS, legal budgets, and law firm engagement.

detailed_profile.name: Prakhar N.
detailed_profile.position: IIFL Finance | SPJIMR | MA Economics | Ex-UPSC CSE Aspirant | NMIMS Mumbai | Chartered Wealth Manager
detailed_profile.about: From boardrooms to blackboards, from economic models to life‚Äôs unexpected lessons ‚Äî my journey has been anything but linear, and I‚Äôm grateful for every curve on the road. I‚Äôm a finance professional with a passion for learning and teaching, holding a PGDM (Finance) from SPJIMR and an MA Economics & BSc Finance from NMIMS. I have work at IIFL Finance under their i-ACE Management Trainee program. Beyond the degrees, I‚Äôve taught economics, scaled EdTech products, mentored hundreds of students, and spent four formative years pursuing the UPSC dream ‚Äî gaining resilience, perspective, and comfort with uncertainty. Today, I bring this diverse lens to everything I do ‚Äî decoding balance sheets, crafting investor stories, building relationships, and understanding the human side of business. I believe work should create value beyond profit, and that in life (and finance), compounding is the most beautiful force of all.

detailed_profile.name: Sandeep K. Rajput
detailed_profile.position: 20+ Years of Legal Excellence | Corporate Governance | Retail Asset & Business Litigation | Passionate Wildlife Enthusiast & Nature Seeker
detailed_profile.about: With close to two decades of rich and diverse experience across Legal Affairs, Corporate Governance, Litigation, Non-Litigation, Collections & Recovery, Risk Management, and Legal Business Strategy, I have successfully led senior leadership roles that have directly enhanced corporate efficiency and profitability. My expertise encompasses end-to-end management of litigation and non-litigation matters, legal recoveries, compliance frameworks, legal content development, abstracting, indexing, and strategic business analysis. Throughout my career, I‚Äôve remained committed to continuous learning, legal research, and the highest standards of integrity and accountability. Currently serving as the Head Legal Recovery in the retail assets segment, I have led high-impact legal initiatives resulting in substantial cost savings and effective risk mitigation. Through strategic contract negotiations, robust compliance programs, and forward-thinking legal solutions, I‚Äôve steered organizations through complex regulatory landscapes‚Äîdriving legal excellence at every level. My leadership in high-stakes litigation, coupled with strategic advisory support to senior management, has been pivotal in protecting institutional interests and enabling sustainable business growth in an evolving market. Backed by a strong professional track record and deep domain expertise, I remain confident and prepared to address the legal challenges of today‚Äôs dynamic and competitive business environment. #IIFL #Axis #Kotak #Magma #Mahindra #Sonalika #GE Warm regards, Sandeep K Rajput üìß advocate.srajput@gmail.com

positions.description: Special Projects ‚Äì Retail Assets DivisionDriving and overseeing critical legal projects within the Retail Assets segment, ensuring seamless integration of business objectives with legal frameworks.Litigation & Non-Litigation Management / Legal AdvisoryExpert handling of end-to-end legal proceedings, including strategizing and executing both litigation and non-litigation matters to protect institutional interests and ensure regulatory compliance.Gold Loan & MOHO (Money at Home) OperationsLegal support and strategic oversight for legal process. ensuring risk mitigation, compliance, and asset protection.Unsecured Loans & Digital Lending PlatformsLegal governance and litigation / non litigation, legal advisory and contract management of unsecured and digital loan portfolios, including drafting and vetting digital contracts, managing defaults, and navigating fintech compliance frameworks.Secured Business Loan ( SBL) & High Ticket Business LoanHandling complex legal structures related to SBL transactions‚Äîensuring title verification, enforceability, and fast-track resolution of disputes and recoveries.Loan Against SecuritiesEnd-to-end legal execution and monitoring of loans backed by financial assets, including capital market-linked instruments, ensuring adherence to regulatory and risk norms.Legal Case Management ‚Äì Retail Asset PortfolioStrategic supervision of retail asset-related legal cases, ensuring effective representation, timely resolution, and alignment with recovery targets.RBI Compliance & Regulatory ReportingEnsuring accurate and timely legal reporting to the Reserve Bank of India, maintaining alignment with all statutory and regulatory obligations impacting the lending ecosystem.High-Ageing Legal Accounts & Recovery ManagementSpecialized focus on resolving long-pending and high-value NPA accounts through aggressive legal strategies, settlements, and enforcement actions to optimize recovery efficiency.
positions.title: Head of Legal Recovery | Retail Assets
positions.description_html:
Special Projects – Retail Assets Division
Driving and overseeing critical legal projects within the Retail Assets segment, ensuring seamless integration of business objectives with legal frameworks.

Litigation & Non-Litigation Management / Legal Advisory
Expert handling of end-to-end legal proceedings, including strategizing and executing both litigation and non-litigation matters to protect institutional interests and ensure regulatory compliance.

Gold Loan & MOHO (Money at Home) Operations
Legal support and strategic oversight for legal process. ensuring risk mitigation, compliance, and asset protection.

Unsecured Loans & Digital Lending Platforms
Legal governance and litigation / non litigation, legal advisory and contract management of unsecured and digital loan portfolios, including drafting and vetting digital contracts, managing defaults, and navigating fintech compliance frameworks.

Secured Business Loan ( SBL) & High Ticket Business Loan
Handling complex legal structures related to SBL transactions—ensuring title verification, enforceability, and fast-track resolution of disputes and recoveries.

Loan Against Securities
End-to-end legal execution and monitoring of loans backed by financial assets, including capital market-linked instruments, ensuring adherence to regulatory and risk norms.

Legal Case Management – Retail Asset Portfolio
Strategic supervision of retail asset-related legal cases, ensuring effective representation, timely resolution, and alignment with recovery targets.

RBI Compliance & Regulatory Reporting
Ensuring accurate and timely legal reporting to the Reserve Bank of India, maintaining alignment with all statutory and regulatory obligations impacting the lending ecosystem.

High-Ageing Legal Accounts & Recovery Management
Specialized focus on resolving long-pending and high-value NPA accounts through aggressive legal strategies, settlements, and enforcement actions to optimize recovery efficiency.

experience.title: AVP - Regional Head
experience.description: Key Responsibilities:	1.	LAP Product and Policy Design:	‚Ä¢	Develop and implement innovative LAP product strategies tailored to market demands.	‚Ä¢	Define policies and procedures to ensure compliance and alignment with organizational objectives.	2.	Distribution Network Management:	‚Ä¢	Build and maintain a robust distribution network, including Direct Selling Agents (DSAs), to maximize market reach.	‚Ä¢	Develop channel strategies to enhance efficiency and profitability of the DSA network.	3.	Market Analysis and Business Development:	‚Ä¢	Conduct regular market analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and competitive benchmarks.	‚Ä¢	Develop and execute strategies to increase market share and ensure regional business growth.	4.	Portfolio Quality Management:	‚Ä¢	Monitor and manage the quality of the LAP portfolio, ensuring minimal non-performing assets (NPAs).	‚Ä¢	Implement risk mitigation strategies to maintain a healthy portfolio.	5.	Collection Management:	‚Ä¢	Oversee the collections process to ensure timely recovery and minimize delinquencies.	‚Ä¢	Drive collection efficiency through process optimization and effective team management.	6.	Learning and Development:	‚Ä¢	Identify skill gaps within the regional team and organize training sessions to enhance capabilities.		7.	Team Leadership:	‚Ä¢	Lead, motivate, and manage a high-performing regional team.	‚Ä¢	Set clear goals and performance expectations, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.Experience-	‚Ä¢  20+ years of experience in financial services, with a focus on LAP products and regional business operations.	‚Ä¢	Proven expertise in DSA channel management and distribution network development.	‚Ä¢	Strong analytical skills with experience in market analysis and portfolio management.	‚Ä¢	Excellent leadership, communication, and decision-making skills.Key Competencies:	‚Ä¢	Strategic Thinking	‚Ä¢	Market Insights and Adaptability	‚Ä¢	Risk Management	‚Ä¢	Relationship Building	‚Ä¢	Results-Oriented Leadership
experience.description_html:
Key Responsibilities:
1. LAP Product and Policy Design:
• Develop and implement innovative LAP product strategies tailored to market demands.
• Define policies and procedures to ensure compliance and alignment with organizational objectives.
2. Distribution Network Management:
• Build and maintain a robust distribution network, including Direct Selling Agents (DSAs), to maximize market reach.
• Develop channel strategies to enhance efficiency and profitability of the DSA network.
3. Market Analysis and Business Development:
• Conduct regular market analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and competitive benchmarks.
• Develop and execute strategies to increase market share and ensure regional business growth.
4. Portfolio Quality Management:
• Monitor and manage the quality of the LAP portfolio, ensuring minimal non-performing assets (NPAs).
• Implement risk mitigation strategies to maintain a healthy portfolio.
5. Collection Management:
• Oversee the collections process to ensure timely recovery and minimize delinquencies.
• Drive collection efficiency through process optimization and effective team management.
6. Learning and Development:
• Identify skill gaps within the regional team and organize training sessions to enhance capabilities.

7. Team Leadership:
• Lead, motivate, and manage a high-performing regional team.
• Set clear goals and performance expectations, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.

Experience-
• 20+ years of experience in financial services, with a focus on LAP products and regional business operations.
• Proven expertise in DSA channel management and distribution network development.
• Strong analytical skills with experience in market analysis and portfolio management.
• Excellent leadership, communication, and decision-making skills.

Key Competencies:
• Strategic Thinking
• Market Insights and Adaptability
• Risk Management
• Relationship Building
• Results-Oriented Leadership

detailed_profile.position: Manager At Iifl Finance Ltd
detailed_profile.about: Responsibilities:- Getting new Accounts of customer for Banking. Asseessing the accounts of customer. Handle the Disbursment. Handle the Daily Collection &Banking of company. Sales and Marking related responsibilities include To achieve given sales nos through customer walk in work closely with the branch service executives to drive loan customers for fulfillment ensuring policy adherence and meeting compliance requirement. Cross sale Responsible for achieving the monthly and annual targets Maintain good relationship with customers and local people to improve the business Manage the total loans given out to customer and motivate them on time loan repayment. Cash and Cheque Collection Receipting and proper record keeping through cash scrollbook.Banking of cash and cheque Collected over the counter in a day as per defined process. Manage other administrative activities. Operation related responsibilities Include Scrutiny of New Business applications & Revivals at the branch and its processing till KYC guidelines and Third Party Norms. Handling of subsequent escalation for New Business issues of Customer service. Also had responsibility of looking over Branch Administration. Maintenance & Management of office infrastructure & IT Assets. Follow client verification norms as per standards to ensure credit worthiness before disbursement of loans Ensure and submission of all relevant records & reports of all clients on time as well as internal branch records Profile: System Executive (Core Banking software) Configure all system to main server. Migrate the manual Branches into computerized Provide banking software support to banks employees. Also provide training to staff regarding core banking software .(oracale,finacle)

Cash and Cheque Collection Receipting and proper record keeping through cash scrollbook.Banking of cash and cheque Collected over the counter in a day as per defined process.

Accounting of Petty cash for Branch Expenses and proper record keeping of petty cash Voucher with Monthly Reconciliation. Fixed assets recording and maintenance through timely physical verification
.
Manage other administrative activities.

Operation related responsibilities Include

Scrutiny of New Business applications & Revivals at the branch and its processing till KYC guidelines and Third Party Norms.

Handling of subsequent escalation for New Business issues of Customer service.

Also had responsibility of looking over Branch Administration. Maintenance & Management of office infrastructure & IT Assets.

LMS Administration ÔÉò	This includes basic LMS Admin tasks such as: ÔÅ∂	Reports management - fetching reports from LMS and presenting the same, ÔÅ∂	User Management ‚Äì assigning / adding / deleting users, ÔÅ∂	Content Management - Uploading training courses, etc.
experience.description_html:
Core Job Role
 Provide in house training for all the levels of staff (BM’s, AM’S, JRE, CCE, Inters).
 Groomed new trainers in the team – Process knowledge, training delivery, report management, handover process.
 Conduct sales oriented refresher training for enhancing business.
 Assisting with various projects and tasks as needed while meeting required deadlines.
 Develop and manage reports on completed training throughout the network
 Coordinating and assisting employees in completing their quarterly online test.
 Support and collaborate with Trainers in all Training and Development aspects
 Evaluate the employees after each training session.
 Conducting weekly and monthly review meeting with trainers to check the progress of the training/ if any requirements for effective training etc.
 Motivate learners through effective training methodologies both in-group and individual classroom dynamics.
 Utilize a variety of the training methodologies, techniques, concepts, learning tools, and practices to ensure maximum effectiveness of training delivery, as per the framework provided.
 Conduct specific training needs assessments to support the design, development and delivery.
 Monitor and measure effectiveness of training programs and provide necessary feedback to the corporate team for necessary changes when required.





Other Responsibilities –
Creating Training Content
 Designing and developing instructionally sound training content, this could include creation of video scripts, PPT based training slides, facilitator guides, Sales pitch, et al. based on the training needs analysis, updates in the service offerings, organization goals.
LMS Administration
 This includes basic LMS Admin tasks such as:
 Reports management - fetching reports from LMS and presenting the same,
 User Management – assigning / adding / deleting users,
 Content Management - Uploading training courses, etc.

experience.title: BFSI & Soft Skill Facilitator
experience.description: Core Job Role ‚ÄìÔÉò	Training delivery: Demonstrates product & process knowledge, customer service skills and selling skills specifically required in the retail industry.ÔÉò	Create and maintain a positive and professional learning environment.ÔÉò	Utilize a variety of the training methodologies, techniques, concepts, learning tools, and practices to ensure maximum effectiveness of training delivery, as per the framework provided.ÔÉò	To conduct classroom and practical assessments for the learners and evaluate their performance.ÔÉò	Coaching conversation to help them derive the best possible outcome for their life.ÔÉò	Tracking placements of the learners.ÔÉò	Conducting various appointments with the right employers for Placement and Guest session.ÔÉò	Maintain proper documents and files for the Training.ÔÉò	Work as a MIS.ÔÉò	Content creation: Understanding training requirements and converting those into effective training programs. Researching the content for specific behavioral learning requirements. Researching and suggesting new pedagogies and approachesÔÉò	Digital learning: Driving Digital Learning and Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs), online courses from www.eskillindia.org adoption in the organization as well as on Virtual mode and LMSÔÉò	Managing program logistics:  Effective management of program logistics that include sending of training invitations, follow through with participants, driving completion of program pre and post activities, connect with training providers and overseeing other administrative requirements.Other Responsibilities ‚ÄìÔÉò	Youth Development Module:Focus on Mindfulness, Basic of Financial Literacy, Digital Literacy, Workplace Readiness, Communicative English, Values, Life Skills, Self-Discovery.
experience.description_html:
Core Job Role –

 Training delivery: Demonstrates product & process knowledge, customer service skills and selling skills specifically required in the retail industry.
 Create and maintain a positive and professional learning environment.
 Utilize a variety of the training methodologies, techniques, concepts, learning tools, and practices to ensure maximum effectiveness of training delivery, as per the framework provided.
 To conduct classroom and practical assessments for the learners and evaluate their performance.
 Coaching conversation to help them derive the best possible outcome for their life.
 Tracking placements of the learners.
 Conducting various appointments with the right employers for Placement and Guest session.
 Maintain proper documents and files for the Training.
 Work as a MIS.
 Content creation: Understanding training requirements and converting those into effective training programs. Researching the content for specific behavioral learning requirements. Researching and suggesting new pedagogies and approaches
 Digital learning: Driving Digital Learning and Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs), online courses from www.eskillindia.org adoption in the organization as well as on Virtual mode and LMS
 Managing program logistics: Effective management of program logistics that include sending of training invitations, follow through with participants, driving completion of program pre and post activities, connect with training providers and overseeing other administrative requirements.

Other Responsibilities –
 Youth Development Module:
Focus on Mindfulness, Basic of Financial Literacy, Digital Literacy, Workplace Readiness, Communicative English, Values, Life Skills, Self-Discovery.

experience.title: Trainer of BFSI & Soft Skill

experience.description_html:
Core Job Role –

 Plan out activities related to do Training
 Assess training needs and agree learning aims
 Design New Training Programs or adapt existing ones
 Develop training materials
 Design and conduct weekly assessments
 Maintain training rooms and resources related to training delivery
 Deliver Training Programs
 Evaluate training effectiveness through student performance
 Give constructive feedback to learners and management
 Make ongoing improvements in the current content and delivery style
 Maintain all training and student performance related MIS updated

Other Responsibilities –
 Display expertise related to the subject matter and continuously develops oneself with domain knowledge.
 Motivate, encourage and raise awareness among the students about skill development program and better employment opportunities in organized sectors.
 Actively participate and support mobilization activities by visiting NGO's, outskirt/slum areas.
 Assist with planning and coordinating special events with other staff members, as needed
 Manage the upkeep of records that are essential to control, evaluation, and reporting
 Report and update daily training activities to the academic head.
 Responsible to co-ordinate with center manager and other staff members for betterment of center performance.
 Responsible for coordinating and conducting the Guest lecture for every course in coordination with the concerned person
 Responsible for post placement follow-up of the students
 Responsible to extend every possible support to his/her supervisor and other staff members for smooth operation of the center in every aspect.

experience.description_html:
Core Job Role –

 Deliver high quality training that follows company methodology, and matches to the skills required by the corporate clients.
 Deliver programs through Classrooms, on job coaching, Virtual mode and LMS. The timely completion of e-learning modules by the employees will be a responsibility of learning specialist.
 Regularly coordinate with the Training Manager regarding all training activities and process steps.
 Manage the early assessment process and implement growth plan for students, so their skills can meet needs of the corporate clients
 Ensure that each student meets the requirements as per the Client Skill Matrix
 Work with the Regional Placement Manager in mid and final assessments to gauge employability of students
 Counsel students regularly to ensure fewer dropouts and greater acceptance of placement opportunities
 Engage with students and their parents and provide feedback on student’s progress and learning
 Work with Training manager to incorporate student feedback into future processes and content
 Occasionally support and provide training demos for large colleges, partners and villages
 Gather referrals from all students as the Student Referral SOP
 Provide regular feedback to the Training Manager on training content and the need for local customization
 Timely submission of delivery reports with accurate data. The Learning Specialist will also analyze the business data to understand the insights, which will add value by way of business improvement interventions in their zone.


Other Responsibilities –
Foundation Courses: (Communication Skill, Personality Development, Interview Skill, Digital Literacy)
